Reviews.Title: Waste of time and money. Power system for this tablet cheap.
Reviews.Author: Ricci Nina
Reviews.Content: Battery died and tablet died which rendered the tablet useless. Didn't even last pass the first charge up. Do not buy this item/

Reviews.Title: Perfect second monitor for a Windows 8 touchscreen Laptop!
Reviews.Author: D. Nanjappa "etc."
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for quite some time, trying to find a *portable* IPS full HD screen for around $200 and have finally found it!The screen looks great, and with iDisplay ($10 or so) I can move my Windows apps off to this tablet and use it as a 2nd monitor.The device arrived today, so I'll update if necessary.
